summary: Completed comprehensive UI testing of Business Customer Portal and Technician Portal. All pages load correctly with proper role-based access control. Both portals have consistent UI/UX with their respective themes (Business: light/indigo, Technician: dark/green).

minor.issue: 404 errors in console for some static resources (likely favicon or images)

elements_verified: Stats cards (Fleet Vehicles, Open Tickets, Pending Approval, Pending Payment)
AMC Status card with View Contracts button
This Month tickets resolved with View Reports button
Active Service Tickets section with View All link
Pending Invoices section with View All link
Financial Summary footer (Total Invoiced, Total Paid, Outstanding)
Sidebar navigation with all menu items
Stats cards (Total Vehicles, Active, In Service)
Empty state message when no vehicles
Add Vehicle dialog with form fields (Vehicle Number, Category, Model, OEM, Year, Driver Name, Driver Phone)
Summary cards (Total Invoiced, Pending Payment, Paid)
Stats cards (Active Contracts, Total Contracts, Contract Value)
Request AMC Quote button in empty state
Summary cards (Total Tickets, Total Invoiced, Paid, Outstanding)
Stats cards (Open, In Progress, Estimate Pending, Completed Today, This Month)
My Active Tickets section with View All link
My Performance card with Avg Resolution Time
Quick Actions (Apply for Leave, AI Diagnosis Help, View Attendance)
Empty state when no tickets assigned
Today's Status card (present/absent badge, check-in time)
Summary cards (Present, Absent, Late, Half Day)
Leave balance cards (Casual, Sick, Earned, Total Used) with progress bars
Summary cards (Latest Salary, YTD Earnings, Avg Monthly)
Latest Payslip section with draft badge
Earnings breakdown (Basic Salary, HRA, Allowances, Overtime, Gross Earnings)
Deductions breakdown (PF, ESI, Professional Tax, TDS, Total Deductions)
Your Rank This Month card (#1 of N technicians, Top Performer badge)
Stats cards (Tickets Resolved, Avg Resolution Time, Total Resolved, Critical Resolved)
By Priority breakdown (Low, Medium, High, Critical)

tests: Technician trying to access /business is redirected to /technician

mocked_integrations.razorpay: Razorpay payments in MOCK mode for bulk payment

context_for_next_testing_agent: Business and Technician portals fully tested. Business Portal has light theme with indigo accents, includes Dashboard, Fleet Management, Service Tickets, Invoices, Payments, AMC Contracts, and Reports. Technician Portal has dark theme with green accents, includes Dashboard with check-in/out, My Tickets, Attendance, Leave Management, Payroll with salary breakdown, and My Performance with rank and metrics. Role-based access control working correctly - users are redirected to their respective portals based on role. All dialog forms and navigation working properly.
